definition: seriously ill and about to die
full/to fill/completely/more
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
on one's deathbed/at the point of death

sentences.english: The wise old Mother Superior was dying.
sentences.chinese: 睿智的老女修道院長處在了彌留之際。

sentences.english: Near death, the farmer called his clever son to his side.
sentences.chinese: 彌留之際，農夫叫聰明的老大到他的身邊。

sentences.english: The mercury sank in the mouth of the dying day.
sentences.chinese: 水銀柱沉入了彌留之日的口中。

sentences.english: However plum one day a thin continue, and finally to happen.
sentences.chinese: 但是梅子一天天瘦了下去，終於到了彌留之際。

sentences.english: So, painstakingly, he combed the thatch of the past.
sentences.chinese: 在彌留之際，他艱難地梳理密密麻麻的往事。

sentences.english: In his last time Hassan let Nassau lead the whole caravan.
sentences.chinese: 彌留之際，老人把整個商隊的命運和未來交給了兒子。

sentences.english: In the moribund patient deepening coma are the usual preludes to death.
sentences.chinese: 病人彌留之際，加深的昏睡通常是死的前兆。

sentences.english: Live as you will have wished to have lived when you are dying.
sentences.chinese: 要過上你彌留之際所希望的生活。

sentences.english: Blade holding point of wheat, loudly interrogation xishi eventually is who.
sentences.chinese: 刀鋒抱着彌留的麥子，大聲訊問西施終究是誰。

definition: silent prayer/pray in silence
to be deeply grieved
to depart this life/to be no more
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
to feel hatred/to harbor a grudge
the State of Qǐ in modern Qǐ county 杞縣|杞县, Henan (c. 1500-445 BC), a small vassal state of Shang and Western Zhou for most of its existence
in mourning
lit. bleak wind and icy rain (idiom)/fig. hardships/miserable circumstances
to cater to sb to make them happy (esp. of one's parents)
long-cherished wish
illusion (Buddhism)/pipe dream
to die or be martyred for a noble cause/to be faithful unto death
to know how to count and do sums/numerate/numeracy
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
World Games/abbr. for 世界運動會|世界运动会[Shi4 jie4 Yun4 dong4 hui4]
muddle-headed
